sense.gloss: to distribute, to hand out, to deliver, to deal out, to serve out
to allot, to allocate, to place (staff, soldiers, etc.), to station
slave labour, slave labor, compulsory service, forced labour, forced labor, exacted service
being endowed with (e.g. a gift), being blessed with, endowment

sdata.j: このテレビ↑月賦↑↓げっぷ↓で↑買↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: I bought this TV on the installment plan.

sdata.j: このテレビを↑月賦↑↓げっぷ↓で↑買↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: I bought this TV on the installment plan.

sdata.j: ↑月賦↑↓げっぷ↓によって↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓は↑昔↑↓むかし↓よりたくさんのものを↑購入↑↓こうにゅう↓できる。
sdata.e: By means of monthly payments, people can purchase more than in the past.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓には↑天賦↑↓てんぷ↓の↑才↑↓さい↓がある。

words.gloss: to distribute, to hand out, to deliver, to deal out, to serve out
